sentences.chinese: 匈奴殺代都尉朱英。澤免相。
sentences.literal: Xiongnu killed Dai commandery lieutenant Zhu Ying. Ze dismissed from chancellor.

sentences.chinese: 八。十一月乙丑，御史大夫公孫弘為丞相，封平津侯。
sentences.literal: Eight. Eleventh month yi chou, Imperial Secretary Gongsun Hong as Chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Pingjin.

sentences.chinese: 春，長平侯衛青為大將軍，擊右賢。衛尉蘇建為游擊將軍，屬青。左內史李沮為強弩將軍，太僕賀為車騎將軍，代相李蔡為輕車將軍，岸頭侯張次公為將軍，大行息為將軍：皆屬大將軍，擊匈奴。
sentences.literal: Spring, Changping Marquis Wei Qing as Grand General, attacked Youxian. Guard commander Su Jian as roaming strike general, subordinate to Qing. Left interior minister Li Ju as strong crossbow general, grand coachman He as chariot cavalry general, Dai chancellor Li Cai as light chariot general, Antou Marquis Zhang Cihou as general, chief of protocol Xi as general: all subordinate to grand general, attacked Xiongnu.

sentences.chinese: 大將軍青再出定襄擊胡。合騎侯公孫敖為中將軍，太僕賀為左將軍，郎中令李廣為後將軍。翕侯趙信為前將軍，敗降匈奴。衛尉蘇建為右將軍，敗，身脫。左內史沮為彊弩將軍。皆屬青。
sentences.literal: Grand general Qing again went out Dingxiang attacked Xiongnu. Heqi Marquis Gongsun Ao as middle general, grand coachman He as left general, palace gentlemen commander Li Guang as rear general. Xi Marquis Zhao Xin as front general, defeated surrendered to Xiongnu. Guard commander Su Jian as right general, defeated, body escaped. Left interior minister Ju as strong crossbow general. All subordinate to Qing.

sentences.chinese: 十��中，淮南王安、衡山王賜謀反，皆自殺，國除。
sentences.literal: Tenth month middle, Huainan King An, Hengshan King Ci plotted rebellion, all committed suicide, states abolished.
